title: BUGS BUGS BUGS
body: Does any1 else have problems with the client since pre season?? at first runes didnt want to load now i cant open honor capsules etc i have alot of problems in my client can any1 help? dont tell me to restart the client cause i've done that like a 100 times...

replies.body: Have you tried running a repair on the client to see if that fixes any possibly damaged game files? If that doesn't help then this is most likely a connection issue where the client just isn't able to grab the information you're trying to access. In that case, check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on port forwarding and dns to get a bit of a smoother connection with our servers.
